mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL, B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CODE,COUNTRY_NO, READ_COUNT,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CONTENT_LIKE CL WHERE CL.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.TAG_CONTENT, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL, B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CODE,COUNTRY_NO, B.READ_COUNT, COUNT(CL.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN TAG T ON B.TAG_NO = T.TAG_NO LEFT JOIN CONTENT_LIKE CL ON B.BOARD_NO = CL.BOARD_NO WHERE T.TAG_NO = 2 GROUP BY T.TAG_CONTENT, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL, B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CODE,COUNTRY_NO, B.READ_COUNT ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
